faqs.question: What makes Diksha different from other coaching institutes?
faqs.answer: Our unique teaching methodology combines concept visualization, application workshops, and continuous assessment. We maintain a 1:15 teacher-student ratio for personalized attention.

faqs.question: Do you provide scholarships?
faqs.answer: Yes, we offer merit-based scholarships up to 100% tuition fee waiver for top performers in our entrance test.
